description: This file implements the core functions of the Slap Env Controller Object, including managing its activation state, setting up the runtime environment with system containers and object descriptors, and handling engagement and cancellation of object activities. It is part of the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) in a broader service delivery system.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoEngage(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Engages the environment controller by activating its context, invoking the object mapper, and setting up the environment if not already active.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoCancel(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cancels the environment controller activities, deactivates its context, cancels object mappings, and deletes associated containers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoSetupEnv(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Sets up the runtime environment by creating system containers, enrolling object descriptors, and creating necessary objects within those containers.
